words_with_descriptions.chip: A short, lofted shot in golf, where the ball pops quickly into the air.
words_with_descriptions.foul: An unfair or illegal sports action that breaks the rules of the game.
words_with_descriptions.putt: A gentle golf stroke used to roll the ball into the hole on the green.
words_with_descriptions.tackle: The act of bringing an opponent to the ground in sports like football.
words_with_descriptions.hoops: A colloquial term for basketball, referring to the game or the baskets themselves.
words_with_descriptions.canoe: A narrow boat pointed at both ends and open on top, propelled by one or more paddles.
words_with_descriptions.lob: A shot that sends the ball high into the air, used in tennis and other racket sports.
words_with_descriptions.sprint: A short, fast race run at full speed over a limited distance.
words_with_descriptions.javelin: A sport in which a spear is thrown as far as possible.
